resources.string: Unable to login: account is not verified.
Your password needs to be at least eight characters long and include one letter and one number. Spaces are not allowed.
Too many invalid login attempts, please try again after 15 minutes.
Permission to connect to nearby devices is missing
Bluetooth permission is required to connect with the lock
Location permission is required to connect with Bluetooth
Permission to scan for nearby devices is required to connect with the lock
Add/remove keys, read logs, change settings.
Open the door remotely via the app or via a guest link.
Open the door using a six digit code.
Open the door with a touch
Are you sure you want to add this key?
Are you sure you want to edit this key?
Are you sure you want to delete this key?
Are you sure you want to open the door remotely?
Are you sure you want to lock the door remotely?
Connected to the lock via the internet
Connected to the lock via Bluetooth
Do you want to import this key?
Cannot import this key as you already have a key for this lock.
Anyone can open the door with a touch
Automatically locks when the door is closed
At present, it\'s not possible to adjust the sensitivity of the sensor to match your particular situation. This may result in your door locking either too soon or too late.
Automatically lock the door at a specific time
Rotates the knob automatically when you turn it
*Door will be automatically locked everyday at
The battery level is below 20%. Please replace the batteries or recharge them if you have the LOQED Power Kit.
The Bridge Wi-Fi strength is below 20%. Please improve Wi-Fi reception where your Bridge is located for better performance.
The Bridge Bluetooth strength is below 20%. Please move the Bridge closer to the lock for better performance.
Bridge is not online yet, please check back in a few minutes and confirm that the light on the bridge is green. If the light on the Bridge remains white, tap here to set up the lock correctly.

The LOQED bridge is currently not connected to your smart lock. Please check again in a few minutes, as the connection should be re-established automatically. If this message persists, confirm that the light on the bridge is green and the bridge is not further than three meters from the lock.

The LOQED bridge is currently not connected to your wifi. Please check again in a few minutes, as the connection should be re-established automatically. If this message persists, confirm that the light on the Bridge is green and your wifi connection is working.
Automatically locks the door at set a time
Automatically unlocks the door at a set time
Anyone can open the door with a touch during a set period
Mark your location such that Touch to Open works well.
This function is not implemented yet.
Warning: Your LOQED Touch Smart Lock will not work properly when this notification is disabled.
Warning: Your LOQED Touch Smart Lock will not work properly when background activity notification is disabled.
No response from the lock. Please try again later.
Tap the plus button to make a new key or code.
You do not have any keys yet. Please setup a lock or tap the link you have received from your lock\'s administrator.
Unknown error: the Geofence service is not available now.
Geofence service is not available now. Go to Settings>Location>Mode and choose High accuracy.
Your app has registered too many geofences.
You have provided too many PendingIntents to the addGeofences() call.
Handle upward lock no cylinder rotation
Handle upward lock with cylinder rotation
No response received from the lock. Please try again later
Have you installed the lock on your door yet?
Make sure the white light close to the knob is on. If the light is off, remove the housing, remove the black plastic cover, hold the black button until the light starts flashing and wait ten seconds.
Select your LOQED Touch Smart Lock from the list below. If the list remains empty, please restart your phone and make sure no other Bluetooth devices are connected.

The display module could not be found. Please make sure the display module is connected and confirm that it lights up when it is touched. Please contact LOQED support if the problem persists. Do not continue before this issue is resolved.
Set the location of your LOQED Touch Smart Lock. This is required for Touch to Open.
Choose the battery type you are using for your lock. The included batteries are alkaline batteries.
Choose the direction you turn the knob to lock the door, as viewed from inside.
Set the access code for the first key.
The lock needs to be calibrated to adjust itself to your door. Please make sure the door is open before starting the calibration.
Also make sure the handle is moved up. The door should be open with the lock in locked position.

Code access allows you to open the door without a phone. Note that SKG*** certification is no longer valid when you enable code access. The physical security of your lock is unaffected. Code access can always be enabled and disabled later.
Which type of door handle is on the outside of your door?
Do you move the door handle up to lock the door?
Do you need to turn the lock with the key after moving the handle upward to lock the door?
Plug in the LOQED Bridge and make sure the white light is on. If the light is not white, hold the button until the light starts flashing and wait five seconds.
Select your LOQED Bridge from the list below.
Select your Wi-Fi network. The LOQED Bridge can connect to 2.4 GHz networks.
Enter the password for the selected Wi-Fi network.
Wi-Fi connection could not be established
Your LOQED Touch Smart Lock has been successfully installed!
You already have an administrator key for this lock.\n\nDo you want to continue and set up this lock? This will reset the lock and permanently remove all associated keys and settings.
Resetting the current lock information and all associated keys is irreversible.
The connection to the lock was lost unexpectedly. Please start the setup process from the beginning. Be sure to reset the lock and bridge with the buttons beforehand.
The connection to the bridge was lost unexpectedly. The setup process starts again with the bridge setup.
Please find your LOQED Touch Smart Lock key below. Download the app from www.loqed.com/app, create an account, login, and tap the link below to add the key to your keychain. \n\n
\n\n As you also have \'Remote and webbrowser access\' permission, you can also use your internet browser to open the door with this link.
Your LOQED Touch Smart Lock key
\n\n If the LOQED app does not open after tapping the link, try to copy and paste the link in your webbrowser.
If you only want to give someone the code (
You can now share this key with someone using the button below, or have the recipient scan the QR code.
Alternatively, you can choose to share only the access code. This code can then be used to open the door. The access code is:
The update process has started. Please do not press the update button again before the update is completed. The lock cannot be used for up to five minutes while it is updating.
Update command was not received by the lock, verify the internet connection and try again.
Unlocks the deadbolt while you approach

It\'s important to be aware that if you have enabled the feature, the lock will automatically unlock when your phone connects to it. Additionally, if another user wakes up the lock while you are within Bluetooth range, the lock may also unlock.
\ I have disabled app power management \
You can open the door with your personal code. Use the left button to count and the right button to move the cursor to the next position.
The administrator of the lock may have disabled access with a code.
Touch to Open only activates when you have been away
The Touch to Open functionality will enable after you have been at least 500 meters away from the lock for at least five minutes. You can always use the buttons in the app to open the door.
The administrator of the lock may have disabled Touch to Open for your key.
Prevent app from being put to sleep
For the Touch to Open functionality to work reliably, make sure your phone does not use aggressive power management. Visit dontkillmyapp.com to read how to disable this for your device.
A software update is available for your lock. Tap for more information.

Your lock is downloading a software update. Once the download is complete, you can install it by navigating to \'Software update\' on the \'My lock\' tab. It may take up to one hour before the download is completed and the update button is available. If you just installed the lock and this is the first update, it will be installed automatically. Certain functionality might not be available until the update is completed.
No key time schedules have been set yet.

Pick a personal welcome message for your key that will be displayed on your LOQED Touch Smart Lock. The display on the lock is capable of displaying two lines. Each of the lines cannot contain more than ten characters.
Each of the lines cannot contain more than ten characters.
Disabling your access code will no longer allow you to open the door with a code.
How far do you need to turn your knob on the inside to unlock your door?
Without this permission the app is unable to perform some actions.Please go to settings.
Open with a touch within the lock radius. More Information
The LOQED app collects location data to enable the Touch to Open feature even when the app is closed or not in use.
The protection of your personal data is important to us. Please read and accept the terms of LOQED.
I have read the Privacy Policy and agree to the use of my data.
I have read and accepted the Terms and Conditions.
Charging has started and will take up to four hours to complete. When the charging process is completed, the charging indicator on the lock will turn off.
Please pick a name for the first key that will be created for your LOQED Touch Smart Lock.
Please note that currently, there is a possibility that the lock may unlock while your phone is inside.

Upon approaching your lock, your phone sends a message to awaken it from stand-by and activate Touch to Open. In case you experience a delay in this process, it could be due to your phone\'s inability to quickly detect its location, likely caused by weak network reception. To resolve this issue, you may consider increasing the distance at which your phone attempts to send the message.

Your LOQED Touch Smart Lock uses an algorithm to determine whether your phone is inside or outside. This information is used for the Touch to Open function to work correctly. As every door and every house is different, you can fine-tune this algorithm for your specific situation to get the best performance.

This process needs to be started while outside with the door fully closed. Keep the phone at the same height as the lock and approximately one meter away from the door. This process may take up to thirty seconds, do not close this screen during the process.
Please find your password recovery token below and save it in a secure place. You can copy the token by touching and holding, or use the button to send it to yourself via email.
To recover your lost password, you can enter your recovery token. If you do not have a recovery token, please tap here.
You have entered an invalid password recovery token. Please enter a valid token and try again.
Your password is used to securely encrypt your digital keys. In the event that you lose your password, you can retrieve it with your recovery token. Please enter your account password to continue.
Note that your password is not stored on the LOQED server. It is therefore not possible for you or LOQED to regain access to your account, if you lose your password and recovery token.
I have stored my recovery token securely
In this email you will find your password reset token. In the event that you have lost or forgotten your password, you can regain access to your account %1$s with this token:

We recommend that you print this email, keep it in a safe place, and then delete it from your Inbox, Sent items and Trash. It is not possible for LOQED to recover your password if you have lost your password recovery token, so please store it carefully. 

 In this article you can read how you can regain access to your account using your password recovery token: https://support.loqed.com/en/articles/6142478-use-your-recovery-token-for-a-password-reset 
 With kind regards, 
 The LOQED team
Note that this function is for internal development purpose only and should not be used by LOQED customers.\nChanging this setting may result in not being able to use your lock.
Your account has been created but needs to be confirmed via an email that has been sent to you. After the confirmation you will be able to log in with your newly created account.
Change the location of your lock

The display module could not be found. Please make sure the display module is connected and confirm that it lights up when it is touched. Please contact LOQED support if the problem persists. Do not continue before this issue is resolved.
Please go outside to answer the next question.
It seems like there’s a problem with the Bluetooth module. We recommend restarting your phone to fix this issue
LOQED uses two-factor authentication to keep your account safe. Please enter the six-digit\ncode that we have sent you via email to log in.
Code not working? Send new code.
Already have an account? Go to login
Error validating account! Please try again.
Type in your password to continue

When you approach your lock, your phone sends a message to wake your lock from stand-by and enable Touch to Open. If you notice this does not happen on time, it is possible that your phone is not able to detect its location quickly enough. This can occur because of poor network reception. You can increase the distance at which your phone will try to send this message.
Pick a personal welcome message for your key that will be displayed on your LOQED Touch Smart Lock.
Tap the + button to add a new key Or access code.
No time schedules have been set yet.
Choose the battery type you are using For your lock. The batteries provided with the LOQED Toch Smart Lock are Alkaline batteries.
Tap “Calibrate lock” to start the calibration process on the lock. The lock will fully open and close during this process.
No time schedules have been set yet.
Has the lock already been installed on your door?
Make sure the white light below the cover on you LOQED Touch Smart lock is on. If the light is off, hold the button until the light starts flashing and wait Ten seconds.
Select your LOQED Touch Smart lock from the list below.
Code access allows you to open the door without a phone.
Note that SKG*** certification is no longer valid when you enable code access. The physical security of your lock is unaffected. Code access can always be enabled and disabled later.
You\'re not an admin of this lock, so you\'re not able to manage other users\' keys. If you want to be a lock admin, get your own LOQED Touch here.
Are you sure you want to lock the door remotely?
Are you sure you want to unlock the door remotely?
Are you sure you want to open the door remotely?
To recover your lost password, you can enter your recovery token. If you do not have a recovery token, please
